content: needle p2 k2 p2 repeat 3 more times 44 st round 10 k2 p2tog p1 p2tog k2 p2 repeat 3 more times 36 st round 11 k1 ssk p1 k2tog k1 p2 repeat 3 more times 28 st round 12 k ssk slip just worked stitch back to left needle pass next stitch over stitch just slipped slip to right needle k1 p2 repeat 4 times 20 st round 13 ssk slip just worked stitch back to left needle pass next stitch over stitch just slipped slip to right needle p2 repeat 4 times 12 st round 14 purl all st break off yarn thread a yarn needle and pass through final 12 stitches weave in ends block and enjoy this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only visit infinitetwist com for more patterns inspiration and hand-spun yarns pattern feedback appreciated email info@infinitetwist com fisherman s cap www infinitetwist com small size cast on 80 st join to knit in the round place a stitch marker to indicate the beginning of the round round 1 * k2 p2 * repeat between stars until eor beanie version work 49 more row in established rib pattern 50 row total brimmed version work 69 more row in established rib pattern 70 row total crown shaping round 1 divide stitches so 20 are on each needle beginning with a pair of knit stitches k2 p2 twice k2tog place marker on stitch just worked this stitch marks the center of the decreases of the crown shaping p2 k2 twice p2 repeat 3 more times 76 st round 2 k2 p2 k2 p2tog p1 should be above marker on previous row p2tog k2 p2 twice repeat 3 more times 68 st round 3 k2 p2 k1 ssk p1 k2tog k1 p2 k2 p2 repeat 3 more times 60 st round 4 k2 p2 k1 ssk slip just worked stitch back to left needle pass next stitch over stitch just slipped slip to right needle k1 p2 k2 p2 repeat 3 more times 52 st round 5 k2 p2 ssk slip just worked stitch back to left needle pass next stitch over stitch just slipped slip to right needle p2 k2 p2 repeat 3 more times 44 st round 6 k2 p2tog p1 p2tog k2 p2 repeat 3 more times 36 st round 7 k1 ssk p1 k2tog k1 p2 repeat 3 more times 28 st round 8 k ssk slip just worked stitch back to left needle pass next stitch over stitch just slipped slip to right needle k1 p2 repeat 4 times 20 st round 9 ssk slip just worked stitch back to left needle pass next stitch over stitch just slipped slip to right needle p2 repeat 4 times 12 st round 10 purl all st break off yarn thread a yarn needle and pass through final 12 stitches weave
